attributes.action: Change Great Britain's Currency to the Euro
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think it is unfair for the British public to have to go to a bank or Bureau de Change just to travel abroad in Europe. We should all- be united like the European Union says and the Great Britain shouldn't be any different to Ireland, France or Italy. It would make life a lot easier to use the euro .

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
